      Methods in profile with parameters of type AccountModel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AccountModel.addFriend(AccountModel friend)
      Links an different AccountModel as a friend to this one All friendships are two-way Checks to ensure that new AccountModel is not this and is not already a friend Notifies FriendsListObservers to update if friend successfully added
      void AccountModel.friendPost(AccountModel friend, java.lang.String message)
      Takes a post from a friend and puts it in own news feed
      void OwnProfileController.notifyFriendAdd(AccountModel acc) 
      void FriendsListObserver.notifyFriendAdd(AccountModel acc)
      updates the friends list with the addition of the specified AccountModel
      void OwnProfileController.notifyFriendRemove(AccountModel acc) 
      void FriendsListObserver.notifyFriendRemove(AccountModel acc)
      updates the friends list with the removal of the specified AccountModel
      void NewsFeedModel.post(AccountModel acc, java.lang.String message)
      Adds new news
      void AccountModel.removeFriend(AccountModel friend)
      Removes different AccountModel as a friend to this one All friendships are two-way; breaks both sides of link Notifies FriendsListObservers to update if friend successfully removed
      void BasicProfileView.setAllAccounts(AccountModel[] accounts) 
      Method parameters in profile with type arguments of type AccountModel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void NewsFeedModel.initialize(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,AccountModel> accounts)
      Initializes news feed based on JSON-formatted text file static method because implementation is not tied to a specific instance of NewsFeedModel Does not directly initialize feed, but calls post() for various AccountModels
